text: Human biology is part of biology, biological anthropology, and medicine. It looks at humans. It is related to primate biology, and some other areas. Human biology research includes: * Genetic differences across human populations, present and past * Biological differences related to climate and other elements of the natural environment * Finding the risk of degenerative disease and infectious disease for different populations of people * Human growth and development It deals with human evolution, adaptation, and population genetics. ==Other websites== *Human Biology Association *Society for the Study of Human Biology Symposium Series \- Category:Branches of biology Biology Category:Anthropology Category:Physical anthropology
title: Human biology
